description:
The Intex Pillow Rest Mid-Rise Airbed offers the perfect all-around sleeping solution, providing both campers and in-home users with the convenience of a lightweight, comfortable bed that is built for great sleep anywhere you go. This airbed is covered in a soft, velvety sleeping surface for extra comfort. The powerful built-in pump easily inflates and deflates the airbed within minutes. Whether for camping, vacation, or indoor use, this bed is the prefect multi-functional solution.

  • Inflatable airbed for home use engineered with Fiber-Tech interior construction
  • Built-in, high-powered AC internal electric pump for hassle-free inflation and deflation
  • Inflates mattress in approximately 1-3/4 minutes to the desired firmness
  • Mattress is raised 30 cm from the floor
  • Duffel bag included for easy storage and transport

Size: Queen
Thickness: 30
Dimensions: 1.52m x 2.03m x 30 cm (approx)
Weight capacity: 273 kg
Colour: Beige

Includes:
1 x Air Bed
1 x Electric Pump
1 x Bag

Warning: Not recommended for children under 0-12 months
name: Intex 1EA
